ygData.subject: Re: Gnome Necro!
ygData.msgSnippet: i believe you can kill kobolds to raise your faction with them.  i believe you only have to be careful of the grobb shaman, who i was told hates necros.
ygData.messageBody:
i believe you can kill kobolds to raise your faction with them. i believe
you only have to be careful of the grobb shaman, who i was told hates
necros.

belphenor

>From: Enigma <enigma@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com'" <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Gnome Necro!
>Date: Sun, 16 May 1999 04:48:18 -0500
>
>From: Enigma <enigma@...>
>
>WHOA Let me get this right, you brought your gnome necro to Grob and were
>not KOS? What about the Good NPC in the swamp? I ask because I brought my
>12th lvl gnome necro there and was attacked by the troll guards.
>
><-- Enigma -->
>http://members.door.net/enigma
>
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: James Lecouffe [SMTP:puma@...]
>Sent: Saturday, May 15, 1999 1:11 AM
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Gnome Necro!
>
>From: "James Lecouffe" <puma@...>
>
>
>
> >
> >>Where is a good place for a level 5 Gnomish necro to fight at?
>
>
>I headed for grobb at level 5. its awsome. The froglocks in guk there have
>woven and nettled armor. You cant take then right away, but there are alot
>of thing there that you can that are good ex. Also trolls are fun to be
>with. Also there isnt much fighting for bone chips so its easy to get them.
>Not meny pets there so your sence undead works well.
>
>I have saved 85 plat in a very short time and gone up 6 levels in just over
>a week. Hope this helps! Good luck.
>
>
